data.title: Rummikub clear two Jokers rule
data.meta_description:
On the board:

Black 1
Black 2
Joker (Black 3)
Black 4
Joker (Black 5)

On my rack:

Black 3
Black 5
Yellow 2

The play I want to make:
Swap out my Black 3 and Black 5 for the two Jokers & use ...
data.text:
On the board:

Black 1

Black 2

Joker (Black 3)

Black 4

Joker (Black 5)

On my rack:

Black 3

Black 5

Yellow 2

The play I want to make:

Swap out my Black 3 and Black 5 for the two Jokers & use them with my Yellow 2 as a run or set.

Is this legal?

Or since I am clearing two jokers, am I required to use two tiles (i.e. one for each joker)?

Sorry for the confusion (I am new at this)...

What my opponents are saying is that I can't use just one tile from my rack with the two jokers I cleared ... I must use two tiles from my rack (one for each joker).
